data.name: StoryInvite
data.value:
It's official - you're an inspiration!

You have just been named as an inspiration on The Yoga Map Project.

The aim of the map is to inspire the world to get on its mat – by sharing our yoga stories.

Share your story + inspire someone to get powered by yoga.

Together we can inspire the world to get on its mat.

Lucy Edge, Founder of YogaClicks
Share your story
Girl on a Mission

I created YogaClicks - the shop, the blog, the Yoga Map and the #PoweredByYoga channel - to share what everyone is creating out of yoga.  

And the best part is that you can get involved, get featured, and make a difference - in sharing what we're creating we'll inspire each other, and get the world on its mat!

Lucy Edge, Founder, author of Yoga School Dropout and Down Dog Billionaire.
Other Ways to Get Involved
Broadcast yourself on the world's first living, breathing yoga channel. 
Use the #PoweredByYoga hashtag to get featured. You’ll appear in our Trending feed. 
Shop YogaClicks.Store
We are home to yoga's most creative and inspiring designers - curated for you.
Get the freshest yoga news, designers, trends, fashion, activism, retreats 
Delivered straight to your inbox. If you have writing talent get in touch - let's talk!
We are growing our community!
If you have experience in PR, blogging, brand ambassador programs, social media or marketing and would like to help us grow, please contact lucy@yogaclicks.com.

data.name: WelcomeEmail
data.value:
Welcome to YogaClicks

I wanted to tell you a bit more about the community you just joined - about our purpose. That purpose is to share what the yoga community is creating out of yoga - to inspire each other, and get the rest of the world on its mat!

The best part is that there are lots of ways for you to get involved - to share what you're creating out of yoga. You can write for our style blog, broadcast yourself on our living, breathing yoga channel, or share your yoga story on our Yoga Map. And don't miss our shop - we are home to yoga's most creative and inspiring talent - everything we sell is made and designed by yogis. Scroll down to find out more!

Lucy Edge, Founder of YogaClicks, author of Yoga School Dropout and Down Dog Billionaire.
Four Ways to Get Involved
Broadcast yourself on the world's first living, breathing yoga channel. 
Use the #PoweredByYoga hashtag to get featured. You’ll appear in our Trending feed. 
Spread the word about yoga for happiness - add yourself to The Yoga Map
Add your story to get featured and inspire others on the same path. 
 
Shop YogaClicks.Store
We are home to yoga's most creative and inspiring designers - curated for you.
Get the latest yoga news, designers, trends, fashion, activism, retreats 
Get the latest straight to your inbox and if you have writing talent get in touch - we're interested in featuring you!
We are growing our community!
If you have experience in PR, blogging, brand ambassador programs, social media or marketing and would like to help us grow, please contact lucy@yogaclicks.com.
